relations.Subject: energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

Lighting is a crucial sub-element of energy services in displacement settings. It provides illumination for various activities, enhances safety and security, and enables social interactions during the evening and night.
relations.Subject: lighting

relations.Description: Cooking is an essential sub-element of energy services in displacement settings. It involves the preparation of meals and the provision of heat for food processing, contributing to nutrition, health, and well-being of displaced populations.
relations.Subject: cooking

relations.Description: Heating is a significant sub-element of energy services in displacement settings. It helps maintain thermal comfort, prevents hypothermia, and supports the well-being and health of displaced individuals in cold environments.
relations.Subject: heating

relations.Description: Cooling is an important sub-element of energy services in displacement settings. It provides relief from high temperatures, reduces heat-related health risks, and improves the comfort and livability of temporary shelters.
relations.Subject: cooling

relations.Description: Communication is a vital sub-element of energy services in displacement settings. It enables displaced individuals to connect with their families, access information, seek assistance, and maintain social networks, contributing to their well-being and resilience.
relations.Subject: communication
